import "./post.css" import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons" import {Users} from "../../dummyData" export default function Post({ post }) { const user = Users.filter(u=>u.id ===1) console.log(user[0].username ) return (
u.id === post.userId)} alt="" /> {Users.filter(u=>u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
) }
